name: CORPUS PUGNA
description:
How to play:

arrow keys move,
z/space/enter - confirm

x/escape - back

deplete your opponent's limb health to win

moves require calories and oxygen, oxygen regenerates automatically, calories must be restored with hamburgers.

bend/straighten/clench your arms and fists to change your stance

hold shift at the end of your turn when instructed to use your combo attack, every
combination of bent/straightened/clenched limbs will activate a unique combo attack!
